short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replicate your winning emails by leveraging first&third-party data directly within Gmail and LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flike is an AI-powered outbound email tool that allows you to personalize your outbound emails. With Flike, you can create and send highly targeted, customized emails that increase engagement and drive more conversions. The AI-generated content is unique and tailored to each recipient, making it more likely that the recipient will open and respond to the email.
